text.information.heading: Information:
text.information.title: Information Panel
text.information.subtitle: Click on datapoints for more information
text.help.title: Help
text.help.text:
Explore the LIGO compact binary catalogue, which is all the mergers of Black Holes and neutron stars detected by the LIGO detectors.

Click on the markers on the graph to show information about the various detections
text.help.about: This web-app was written and is maintained by Chris North (Cardiff University). Source code is available on GitHub.
text.help.info: Show information about the selected detection
text.help.settings: Change the graph properties, such as the horizontal and vertical axes
text.help.errors: Turn errors on and off, both in the graph and the information panel
